snippet: The Basque nationalist political party, Batasuna, already illegal in Spain, announced Thursday that it would dissolve itself in France as well.
abstract: Basque nationalist political party Batasuna, already illegal in Spain, says it will dissolve itself in France as well; party was banned in Spain for its connections to armed Basque separatist group ETA.
lead_paragraph: The Basque nationalist political party, Batasuna, already illegal in Spain, announced Thursday that it would dissolve itself in France as well.
